knimeNode.name: Blosum Substitution Matrix
knimeNode.shortDescription: Blosum score between two amino acids

fullDescription.intro:
Blosum score between two amino acids.
References
Knime4Bio. Author: Pierre Lindenbaum PhD, INSERM UMR 915, Institut du thorax, Nantes. Reference: manuscript in preparation. Please, report any problem here.

ports.inPort: Table with two columns: Amino acid 1 and Amino acid 2
ports.outPort: Appends a new column with the blosum score
